message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.GR, cs.SC. 

The paper deals with the problem of computing the convex layers of a set of points in the plane, which is a fundamental problem in computational geometry. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CG (Computational Geometry). The algorithm proposed in the paper involves computing monotone convex chains, which is a common technique in computational geometry and falls under the category of data structures (cs.DS). The paper also involves merging the computed chains, which can be seen as a graph operation and falls under the category of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The problem of computing convex layers is closely related to the problem of computing the convex hull, which is a well-studied problem in computational geometry and falls under the category of geometric algorithms (cs.GR). Finally, the paper involves analyzing the time and space complexity of the proposed algorithm, which is a common theme in the category of scientific computing (cs.SC).
